uniqueCounter - Static variable in class model.Scenario

A criterion of the original user scenario has changed.
updateAlgorithmList() - Method in class view.EncapsulationAlgorithmPanel
This method will ask for the high score of the currently selected user scenario, and be able to display the algorithms with their corresponding distances.

This is called by the DecisionMechanism, if a Criterion of the #userScenarioDeepCopy has changed.

A criterion value of the user scenario has changed.

Updates the questionnaire in case the selected scenario changed, or the scenario name changed.
updatePossibleAlgorithms() - Method in class model.EncapsulationData

updateScenario(String, Criterion) - Method in class decisionMechanism.DecisionMechanism
This should be called by the ScenarioController, if a Criterion of a Scenario with the passed scenario ID has changed.
updateScenarioSelection() - Method in class view.ScenarioTab
 
useAlgorithm(AbstractAlgorithm) - Method in class controller.PeriCATControllerBuilder
Only used at command line! Specifies the algorithm to be used for the encapsulation or decapsulation.

useDecapsulationFile(File) - Method in class controller.PeriCATControllerBuilder

useOutputDirectory(String) - Method in class controller.PeriCATControllerBuilder
Use output directory.
usePayload(List<File>) - Method in class controller.PeriCATControllerBuilder
Only used at command line! Use the passed payload files for encapsulation.
userScenarioDeepCopy - Variable in class decisionMechanism.Decider
The scenario setting of the user.
useScenario(File) - Method in class controller.PeriCATControllerBuilder
